title: BRIEF-Moody's Says $8.7 bln Acquisition Of Avexis Strengthens Novartis's Pipeline In Gene Therapy
text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:27 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Moody's Says $8.7 bln Acquisition Of Avexis Strengthens Novartis's Pipeline In Gene Therapy Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  Moody’s: 
* MOODY’S SAYS $8.7 BILLION ACQUISITION OF AVEXIS STRENGTHENS NOVARTIS’S PIPELINE IN GENE THERAPY, BUT REDUCES FINANCIAL FLEXIBILITY 
* MOODY’S SAYS MONETISING VALUE OF JV STAKE HAS REDUCED DIVERSITY BUT INCREASED CASH BALANCES, AND LEFT UNCERTAINTY OVER USE OF PROCEEDS 
* MOODY’S SAYS EXPECT THAT AVXS-101, IF APPROVED, WILL ONLY HAVE A MEANINGFUL IMPACT ON NOVARTIS’S EBITDA AND CREDIT METRICS FROM 2020 ONWARDS 
* MOODY'S SAYS DEAL WILL NOT DO MUCH TO IMPROVE NOVARTIS'S CREDIT METRICS OVER NEXT 2 YEARS AND WE EXPECT COMPANY TO CONTINUE OPERATING WITH A LEVERAGE Source: bit.ly/2HegzGl Further company coverage:
